name: The Mind Parlor

name: Aspen Counseling & Wellness

description: Tiana Frazier, LMFT, offers relationship therapy, individual therapy, and couples counseling in Dallas, Texas, focusing on helping individuals and couples establish and maintain healthy relationships

description: Offers culturally responsive therapy with Black therapists in Houston, focusing on providing a safe and inclusive space for individuals to navigate life's challenges, with in-person and online sessions available

name: Deep Centered (Austin Location)
description: Provides culturally responsive care with Black therapists in Austin, aiming to create a safe and inclusive space for clients to discuss identity and personal challenges, with both in-person and telehealth options

name: Peace of Mind Mental Health and Wellness
description: Provides therapy services to people of color and ethnic groups, specializing in crisis stabilization, life-skills coaching, and working with military families, with a team of clinicians from diverse backgrounds
